title: Chelsea star David Luiz reveals he’s had no explanation for Brazil exile
text:
David Luiz has never been picked by the current Brazil manager (Getty) David Luiz has proved virtually all his doubters wrong this season â€“ but not the current Brazil manager.
Luiz has been sensational for Chelsea since re-signing for the Premier League club, rubbishing a widely held belief that he was incapable of defending on a consistent basis at the highest level. His performances have helped the Blues open up a 10 point gap at the top of the table that looks very likely to be converted into winning the title.

The centre-back has not featured for Brazil since a 2-2 draw with Uruguay in March last year and manager Tite â€“ who was appointed last June â€“ is yet to select the Chelsea star. Luiz found himself overlooked again for the most recent squad which will play World Cup qualifiers against Uruguay and Paraguay over the next few days.
Brazil manager Tite doesn’t appear to be a fan (Getty) The 29-year-old says heâ€™s been given no explanation for his exclusion.
â€˜I am disappointed to not be in the Brazil squad, but I respect the decision,â€™ he told the Evening Standard .
